name: Tulip Inn Lausanne Beaulieu

reviews.title: Bit too far away from everything
reviews.text: We had two rooms at this hotel one with two single beds for our children and one with a queen bed for ourselves. Our room was quite a good size but the childrens room was very small.
The hotel staff are lovely and the hotel was very clean. The breakfast was also very good.
reviews.title: Comfortable, not central hotel

description: Modern Five-story Hotel Garni in corner location, 100 meters from Congress & Exhibition Center.
